name: Klitorax
description:
Hurry Up, Klitorax needs to find the next toillet! Help otherwise everything gets covered in chocolate thunder.

Suffer/Enjoy challenging phyiscal based rocket controlls. Enemys and wierd effects will cross your way and throw you back. Improve your skills in 16 unique handcrafted stages with raising difficulty. Speedrun friendly ;)

So start over, try not to mess up your pants and fly to salvation!
